data.name: ProvideSsnOrNameDob
data.value: Enter either SSN (9 digits) OR FirstName + LastName + DateOfBirth.

data.name: InvalidSsn
data.value: SSN must be 9 digits (allowing spaces/hyphens) and start with a valid date (ddMMyy).

data.name: InvalidFirstName
data.value: FirstName must be 2–50 letters (Unicode), allowing spaces, hyphens, apostrophes.

data.name: InvalidLastName
data.value: LastName must be 2–50 letters (Unicode), allowing spaces, hyphens, apostrophes.

data.name: DobSsnMismatch
data.value: DateOfBirth ({0}) does not match SSN date ({1}).
